opts.opt: Complete Ventral surface, platform, lateral margins and termination are preserved
Proximal Broken flake, termination absent with evidence of initation present (e.g. platform, bulb of percussion, bulbar scar or fissures)
Medial Broken flake, both proximal and distal margins absent (ie. termination and initiation points)
Distal Distal fragment, termination preserved but proximal margin absent (e.g. missing platform)
Angular fragment Other fragment, typically amorphous with no characteristics of flakes, cores or tools
